lenders.name: The LEAP Foundation
lenders.loan_because: By making micro-loans to female entreprenuers in developing areas, the LEAP Foundation hopes to join many other charity based organizations that grant micro-loans to deserving borrowers worldwide. By helping them grow and expand their own endeavors, LEAP can empower women to take control of their own futures by enabling them to continually focus on the growth necesasary to sustain long term productivity. We hope to become a key element to helping these women create and sustain wealth for themselves, their families, and their communities by helping them with capital to which they otherwise would have no access.

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I believe in random acts of kindness. I chose  Elice's Haradadi Group because I would like to help women lead more independent lives and I once had a clothing business myself.
lenders.occupational_info: As a high school librarian  I help young people find the information they need to complete their school projects.

lenders.name: Janette
lenders.loan_because: I have been homeless, needed a helping hand but didn't find it and believe that no matter what your past is, everybody deserves a break, a moment of trust, and hope that with a small step they can start their own marathon etc.  For me was a loan to buy a new motorbike but was refused, struggled but managed, if I'd had a loan I would have got there quicker!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Lawyer's office, I am the accounts manager, care for client's money and manage the running costs of the firm, and send bills out to folk, and make sure the partners don't overspend.  all money money money - ride a gsxR750 SRAD "Roger" and a gsxr750 K4 "Beeeze" and I love them both  :-)  an Arctophile and slightly crazy, LOVE british real ale... yum yum

lenders.occupational_info: I help guide teams of people who create videogames and make sure the games are as fun as they can be.

That could mean helping them get along with others better, finding ways to make the work easier to do, or doing things that help put the right people into the right jobs.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Healers Worldwide
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the possibility of transformation

lenders.name: janet

lenders.occupational_info: I find talented creative people for big companies who want to hire them.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: For many reasons. I enjoy supporting people around the world who are pursuing a fulfilling life.  I know my money is better used by these kiva borrowers than on snack food and entertainment for me. I feel an innovative  company like Kiva needs to be supported.
lenders.occupational_info: I research coastal ecology in the Great Bay, NH.

lenders.name: Thomas Turner
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help change peoples lives.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to save the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, in a large company, trying to make our business more efficient.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. Luke 12:48

lenders.name: Darnell
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people out who strive for the same mission to be successful business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Support manager who supports all of the technology on campus also over Helpdesk,Desktop, Audiovisual technician.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I am studying and i have my trainneship to Croatia, but I need money for the tickets.
lenders.occupational_info: I am system engineer student, i work in a college as an office asistant, and that is the way I support my family, mother and father

lenders.name: Christine

lenders.name: Gilbert
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I are in a position to help others who are less fortunate. And we feel an obligation to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: Administered a private high school; was an English teacher.

lenders.name: Abigail
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can  help people to grow in all areas of themself with just a little help from others. All it takes is someone who cares and that can change how someone else feels. I hope I can lend more in the future as my business grows.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a single mum since 1993 and have two beautiful sons who are now 21 and 23. I also have a dog called Indigo Blu. I too have a home based business and understand the difficulty of starting and continuing a business when you are not financially affluent. I help people with balancing mind, body & spirit. I teach Meditation & Spiritual Development and I am a SCIO Biofeedback Stress Reduction Practitioner.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe economic opportunity is a basic right and I am grateful for the chance to help nurture the entrepreneurial spirit of the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with process improvement and business planning.

Web Applications - Internet Software - Brand Design & Management.
Create an Internet Storm with Guidescapes

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I have had great personal fortune in this life and wish to share my prosperity with those less fortunate than I.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.occupational_info: I design the inside of airplanes

lenders.name: Jennifer and Olivia
lenders.loan_because: We want to lend a hand to people  and help build their businesses and empower them so hopefully one day they can feel the satisifaction of helping out others in need.

lenders.name: Molly, Sam & Keith
lenders.occupation: Attorney/Mom, Son and Father of Son
lenders.loan_because: My family cares.  Kiva is an easy way to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: it is amazing the impact of what $25 can do for someone who really needs it.

lenders.name: Wonderful World Journeys
lenders.loan_because: I have learned so much from people in third-world countries. This is the best way I know of to give back to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a travel agent specializing in travel to Southeast Asia.  I strive to get my clients out off the main tourist areas and into the authentic culture of the country they are visiting.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I love Kiva :)
lenders.occupational_info: messing about with computers

lenders.name: Molly

lenders.name: Barb & Larry
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to end the cycle of poverty.

lenders.name: Anny
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's fun

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful to be able to do so

lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to share with less fortunate people, and be able to assist in a productive way.

lenders.occupation: Lucille is an Office Administrator; Bob is retired
lenders.loan_because: We want to do what we can to help others achieve their goals.

lenders.loan_because: to help other people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching maths & science to high school students.

lenders.name: Axel
lenders.loan_because: ....of the need!

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I wish to give back to society

lenders.name: Juergen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who really need it. Even a small amount of money can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
Localisation, translation 
(video game industry)

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that of those who have been privileged, much is expected. Throughout life, someone has helped you attain your goals and achieve the inconceivable at each milestone. It is through this act, that we must pass it on and encourage those of little or no means that their life dreams can be fulfilled.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers, software, IT hardware, and system solutions.

lenders.name: Rui
lenders.loan_because:
Being an entrepreneur myself, i truly believe that investing in human talent is always a good investment. Due to a recent opportunity and the difficulties in my home country, I understand how fortunate I am and would like to use Kiva as a way of spreading hope. Everyone deserves an opportunity to have a decent life and achieve their potential and personal realization.

All my loans are dedicated to the memories of Luís António, Belmira Joaquina and Liduina Avelar da Silva. May peace be with them wherever they are.

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world" - Gandhi

"We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop." - Mother Teresa of Calcutta
lenders.occupational_info: I basically manage multiple IT projects in an UK travel industry big player.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a cafe, washing dishes and taking people's food and drinks to their tables. I also study computing at university.

lenders.name: Nighean
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a single reason not to.

lenders.name: panika
lenders.loan_because:
As a fan of Oprah show - I have learnt you need to give back to those not as fortunate, that's where I heard of Kiva.

I like that I can give this money and actually know who is benefitting and always prefer giving money towards under-delevoped countries.

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: I can. I'm inspired by people who materially have much less than me but are still striving to carve out a decent existence for themselves, their families and their communities. And I want to support them in that.

lenders.name: Kids and Dogs
lenders.loan_because: During my life when I needed money, people were there to help me out.  Now, when I have the means to help others, I feel this is a way to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children and adults to play the piano and other musical instruments.  I believe that through music we grow as individuals.  Through music we reach across cultural lines to learn to live together in peace.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Sota
lenders.loan_because: I would  like to support someone who helps ownself.
lenders.occupational_info: designing electronic device

lenders.name: Norwegian
lenders.loan_because: In this way money I 'donate' can be used over and over again for several people. When the first lender pays back I will lend that money to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with water management, working to maintain good water quality or improve water quality where needed.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: kiva allows us to leverage our small donations to make large impacts on real people half way around the world.  How cool is that!?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Computer Information Systems Instructor at College of the Ouachitas.

lenders.name: Bea & Gene
lenders.loan_because: We have chosen to use part of our federal Economic Stimulus payment to help needy persons in other countries on an ongoing basis.

lenders.name: Laci & Manuel
lenders.loan_because: To help individuals attain their goals so that they can then go on to help others themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals research information for their personal and/or professional lives.  My husband promotes small Texas farmers and growers to assist them in marketing their products.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a loaner
lenders.occupational_info: Education - one of the most beautiful job

lenders.name: Mattias W
lenders.loan_because: it's great to be able to help people this way!
lenders.occupational_info: I am writing software for phones.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed and want to help others.

lenders.name: Torben
lenders.loan_because: I think that the money can be a help for someone
lenders.occupational_info: church organisation

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great how Kiva brings people together from all over to help others.  The fact that as a group we can help people with goals continue to move forward makes me smile.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people in child care centers and family child care homes.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.loan_because: we are one at our core, and we believe that this is one of that best ways to help everyone involved. This is a win/win for everyone:-)
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are both Flight Attendant for Southwest Airlines. We have two wonderful children ages 10 and 12. We have been truly blessed and we would just like to pass some of our blessing on to others. :-)

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: What I do for another I do for myself, all of us are connected.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I consider it an investment.  The return on investment is the prosperity that the borrowers achieve through their own efforts.  This, I hope, promotes social stability (dare I say "peace") on our planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend my efforts to projects that enhance a healthy environment.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to lead just and meaningful lives.  Big banks say it's too risky to loan money to poor people.  I know they are wrong.  Microcredit works.
lenders.occupational_info: My work provides an amazing opportunity to wake up every morning excited, passionate and fulfilled.

lenders.name: rebekah
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to succeede.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help an individual overcome challenging barriers in order to better either their personal life or the lives of those around them .
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people and their families who have  rare inherited conditions that make them susceptible to develop kidney cancer.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing entrepreneurs getting access to capital and successfully establishing their businesses thus creating jobs and increasing the standard of living for their family, community and country. This awesome program allows almost anyone to become a philanthropist.
